00037 #ifndef NWK_MGMT_H
00038 #define NWK_MGMT_H
00039 
00040 /* MGMT frame application requests */
00041 #define  MGMT_REQ_POLL        0x01
00042 
00043 /* change the following as protocol developed */
00044 #define MAX_MGMT_APP_FRAME    7
00045 
00046 /* application payload offsets */
00047 /*    both */
00048 #define MB_APP_INFO_OS           0
00049 #define MB_TID_OS                1
00050 
00051 /*    Poll frame */
00052 #define M_POLL_PORT_OS          2
00053 #define M_POLL_ADDR_OS          3
00054 
00055 /* change the following as protocol developed */
00056 #define MAX_MGMT_APP_FRAME    7
00057 
00058 /* frame sizes */
00059 #define MGMT_POLL_FRAME_SIZE  7
00060 
00061 /* prototypes */
00062 void         nwk_mgmtInit(void);
00063 fhStatus_t   nwk_processMgmt(mrfiPacket_t *);
00064 smplStatus_t nwk_poll(uint8_t, uint8_t *);
00065 void         nwk_resetSFMarker(uint8_t);
